text: @StefSimanowitz @SophiaAB81 @Keir_Starmer @BorisJohnson @guardian 2nd Worst Death Rate in the World. Late to Lockdown,Test, Trace & Isolate.Late to stockpile PPE. No protective ring around Care Homes. A Bumbling Bafoon being advised by #RuleBreaker Cummings & a Cabinet full of Degenerates. No Apology. No Humanity. #coronavirus #AllLivesMattter
